general.unrelatedDataText: It is very unusual that fingerprints are used for advertising purposes.
general.bioDataText: Fingerprints are particularly sensitive, since they facilitate identity theft. It is recommended to only provide consent for fingerprint data where absolutely necessary.

home.title: Welcome to your personal privacy dashboard!
home.welcome-msg: We at Company Name want you to understand how we process your personal data.
home.welcome-msg2: In this dashboard, you can view what personal data we process and for which purposes. The dashboard allows you to limit our processing of your personal data by configuring your consent. You can
home.welcome-msg3: The menu in the bottom left gives you a quick overview of the most recent consent-related interactions between you and us.
home.welcome-msg4: If you are new to the privacy dashboard, we recommend you to try out the consent helper.

0.title: Consent
0.content: View all consent interactions between you and us.

1.title: Data
1.content: Tell us which data categories we may process.

2.title: Purposes
2.content: Tell us which purposes we may address.

3.title: TRAPEZE
3.content: Learn more about TRAPEZE on our website.

consent.title: Consent Guide
consent.text: Location data is data that tells us where you have been at what time. We collect location data via GPS if you give permission in the Company Name mobile application. We use your location data to customize our advertising, to plan our marketing geographically, and to prevent fraud via geographic identity verification.
consent.text_ad: Advertising is an integral part of our business model, which guarantees that we can continue to provide you with our restaurant recommandations. We use the below data categories to customize advertising. Tell us below which data categories we may use to customize our advertising.
consent.name: Name
consent.sensitivityText: You can configure how sensitive this data is to you. We treat very sensitive data differently and with extensive care
consent.sensitivityHeader: How sensitive is this data to you?
